workflow.description:
3-Step Approval Workflow. 1st - Initial Approver (with limit) 2nd - Secondary Approver (with limit) 3rd - Super Approver (no limit)
Also has the feature to send e-mails containing a Suitelet link where the user can approve/reject directly from the e-mail
workflow.name: BA | Vendor Bill Multi-stage Approval

returnusererroraction.errortext: You cannot send this vendor bill for approval because you currently have no assigned bill approver. Please take steps to have a abill approver added to your employee record, and try again.

sendemailaction.body:
This is a test email.


Approve Vendor Bill Reject Vendor Bill

initcondition.formula: ( "Next Approver" IN ("User") AND "Workflow:Current Approval Limit" >= "Total" ) OR isChecked("Workflow:Approver Is Super Approver") = 'T'

sendemailaction.body: Your Purchase Order {TRANID} has been approved.
sendemailaction.subject: PO {TRANID} approved

sendemailaction.body: Your Purchase Order {TRANID} has been rejected.
sendemailaction.subject: PO {TRANID} rejected

returnusererroraction.errortext: You cannot send this vendor bill for approval because you currently have no assigned bill approver. The current vendor bill exceeds your current approval limit, so another approver is required. Please take steps to have a bill approver added to your employee record, and try again.
